ygData.subject: Re: Threatening
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a Dark Elf Warrior, I started the game with all the Freeport and commons people being dubious to me.  I have killed orcs by the millions and still do so
ygData.messageBody:
I am a Dark Elf Warrior, I started the game with all the Freeport and
commons people being dubious to me. I have killed orcs by the millions and
still do so now. The majority of the people are still dubious, I have
noticed the odd Innkeeper now is indifferent. So this is from level 1 to
17. The only real way to change there attitudes is by questing, which you
cant do because you are KoS. Catch 22.

Your only hope is to kill literally thousands of orcs, raise the residents
standing to amiable or warm which in turn should affect the guards attitude
to dubious/indifferent.

Hope that helps.

----- Original Message -----
From: Steven <ickster@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 5:12 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Threatening


> From: "Steven" <ickster@...>
>
> Any evil races out there who's successfully changed their faction with the
human guards around Freeport? I've been killing orcs left and right but
guards and innkeeps still threatening to me.
>
> I was hopping to at least be to a point where I can walk in and hope on
boat if I needed to. Of course I'd probably have to deal with guards in
other continents.
>
> Any ideas?
> ---
> Numok lvl 12 Ogre Warrior
>
